entry.title: Mips
entry.content: Mips instruction Field op rs rt rd shamt funct op 6-bits opcode that specifies the operationrs 5-bits register file address of the first source operandrt 5-bits register file address of the second source operandrd 5-bits register file address of the result’s destinationshamt 5-bits shift amount(for shift instructions)funct 6-bits function code augmenting the opcode
